16
17#include <vsip/support.hpp>
18#include <vsip/core/map_fwd.hpp>
19
20
21
22/***********************************************************************
23  Definitions
24***********************************************************************/
25
26namespace vsip
27{
28
29namespace impl
30{
31
32template <typename MapT>
33bool
34processor_has_block(
35  MapT const&    map,
36  processor_type proc,
37  index_type     sb)
38{
39  typedef typename MapT::processor_iterator iterator;
40
41  for (iterator cur = map.processor_begin(sb);
42       cur != map.processor_end(sb);
43       ++cur)
44  {
45    if (*cur == proc)
46      return true;
47  }
48  return false;
49}
50
51
52
53// Special case for Global_map.  Since map is replicated, the answer
54// is always yes (if proc and sb are valid).
55
56template <dimension_type Dim>
57bool
58processor_has_block(
59  Global_map<Dim> const& /*map*/,
60  processor_type         /*proc*/,
61  index_type             sb)
62{
63  assert(sb == 0);
64  return true;
65}
66
67
68} // namespace vsip::impl
69
70} // namespace vsip

72#endif // VSIP_IMPL_PAR_ASSIGN_COMMON_HPP
